bibl.title: The Lord's Prayer and ΧΜΓ: Two Christian Papyrus Amulets.
bibl.note: Two papyri acquired in 1997 from Galerie Nefer in Zürich. - P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 4600. Copy of the Lord's Prayer, largely matching the version of the prayer in Matt 6:9-13. Sixth or early seventh century. - P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 4710. Papyrus amulet with the symbol ΧΜΓ appearing four times in a row.
